async_info.video_description:
The rise in knife crime in London has been described as an epidemic, destroying lives and leaving communities living in fear.
With recorded incidents at the highest recorded level since records began, the police, local and national Government seem at a loss about what to do.
In this film, BBC News reports on one hospital that has bucked the trend - and reduced readmission rates from 45 percent to just 1 percent.
Over the course of several months, BBC News has followed teenage stab victims from the operating theatre, through to their rehabilitation, to see the impact of knife crime on them, their families and communities.
Contains some scenes which viewers may find upsetting and flashing images.
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

comment_content.original_script:
The left-wing need to stop shutting down conversations about immigration. Regardless of what one attributes the disproportionate violence among black and Asian gangs to, one has to accept that all demographics are not the same and to shout "RACIST!" every time someone expresses concern is childish and ignorant. The majority of those polled across Europe want immigration either majorly restricted or even stopped. It is one thing to have mass immigration from European countries, where the immigrants at least share cultural and religious values, but another to have mass immigration from countries with radically different, arguably incompatible cultures and religions that are also often hostile to Western culture.

Leftists, please recognise that those opposed to mass immigration are not necessarily driven by bigotry, but a genuine love for their culture and values and a rational fear of losing them.

async_comment.comment_content_initial:
The left-wing need to stop shutting down conversations about immigration. Regardless of what one attributes the disproportionate violence among black and Asian gangs to, one has to accept that all demographics are not the same and to shout _"RACIST!"_ every time someone expresses concern is childish and ignorant. The majority of those polled across Europe want immigration either majorly restricted or even stopped. It is one thing to have mass immigration from European countries, where the immigrants at least share cultural and religious values, but another to have mass immigration from countries with radically different, arguably incompatible cultures and religions that are also often hostile to Western culture.
Leftists, please recognise that those opposed to mass immigration are not necessarily driven by bigotry, but a genuine love for their culture and values and a rational fear of losing them.
